© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Market intelligence analysis
1
Automated process using UiPath to extract and compile a comprehensive list of 
pet boarding companies including their varied details facilitating the data 
integration into a new CRM system
Pet boarding company

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You are planning to expand in the pet boarding space through acquisition and need a database of Pet boarding companies 
in the U.S. to make informed decisions for the business expansion. You are looking for an automated UiPath process to 
extract and compile a comprehensive list of pet boarding companies including their contact details and services offered, 
facilitating seamless integration into the new CRM system.
Pet boarding company needs to "un-leash" a robust competitor 
database 
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have an extensive database of ~26k pet boarding companies to  make informed acquisition decisions and improve the 
brand presence
•
You have also saved ~300 man-hours through overall automation of creating the database that would have otherwise been done 
manually 
MARKET INTELLIGENCE ANALYSIS
KEY RESULT   
•
~26k companies 
database created
•
~300 man-hours saved 
through automation
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Web scrapping 
automation
•
Data extraction and 
cleansing
•
UiPath automation
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to implement an automated process using UiPath to extract and compile a comprehensive list of 
pet boarding companies along with  their varied details, including:
1) Developing an automated UiPath processes to extract company related details for pet boarding companies across U.S. 
leveraging Google map URLs
2) Performing market sizing exercise leveraging Yellow Pages to identify the unique pet boarding businesses in U.S.
3) Creating a company level database with details such as # locations, google rating, # reviews, company category, 
address, website and contact number
4) Ensuring robust data coverage by targeting the optimal geographic levels (like city, ZIP Code etc.,) based on population 
checks
5) Building a validation layer involving de-duplication, sanity checks, missing records check etc. to ensure data integrity 
throughout the extraction process

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Developed automated UiPath processes to extract company related details for pet boarding companies across U.S. leveraging Google map URLs
•
Performed market sizing exercise leveraging Yellow Pages to identify the unique pet boarding businesses in U.S.
•
Created a company level database with details such as # locations, google rating, # reviews, company category, address, website and contact number
•
Ensured robust data coverage by targeting the optimal geographic levels (like city, ZIP Code etc.,) based on population checks
•
Built a validation layer involving de-duplication, sanity checks, missing records check etc. to ensure data integrity through out the extraction process 
Situation
•
Client was planning to expand in the pet boarding space through acquisition and needed a database of Pet boarding companies in the U.S. to make 
informed decisions for the business expansion
•
Merilytics developed an automated UiPath process to extract and compile a comprehensive list of pet boarding companies including their contact details 
and services offered, facilitating seamless integration into their new CRM system
Market intelligence for a pet boarding company 
3
Impact
•
Created an extensive database of ~26k pet boarding companies to help the client make informed acquisition decisions to improve their brand presence
•
Overall automation of creating the database has saved ~300 man-hours that would have otherwise been done manually 
Market Intelligence Analysis

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Methodology/ approach
4
Process Flow Diagram
Contains the list of all 
cities, states in U.S.
▪
Created an Excel file list of City-states 
in U.S. using U.S. census data
▪
Zip codes were added to the cities 
with population greater than to 500k 
to ensure maximum company 
coverage
▪
This list was used as an input file for 
the UiPath process to extract the 
Google map URLs for Pet boarding 
companies
▪
Developed an UiPath automation 
process, to extract the URLs of all pet 
boarding companies from Google Maps 
for all cities of U.S. to an Excel file
▪
Used the same UiPath process to 
populate another excel file to check if 
the search for any input city failed. The 
failed searches were run again in 
second run
▪
Created the UiPath automation 
process, to extract the company details 
including avg. ratings, total reviews, 
address, phone number, website etc. 
using the URLs extracted in part - 1 and 
stored into an Excel file
▪
Used the same UiPath process to 
populate another excel file to check if 
the search for any URL failed. The 
failed searches were run again in 
second run
▪
The final data was checked and 
cleaned thoroughly for any errors and 
duplications to create the final 
database

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
UiPath extraction of pet boarding companies URLs (Process – 1) 
5
UiPath Input
UiPath Output
In Process-1 of the process we extracted the ~500k URLs for the pet boarding companies across US with population greater than 500k using UiPath. Since, google provided 
nearby search results which lead to duplicate URLs. we de-duplicated these URLs to get unique URLs which were used as inputs for Part-2 pertaining to extraction of 
company details using these URLs. This initial step cut the time for Process-2 by almost ~80%.
